screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .starc file in Story Apps Story Architect 0.7
screenshot.caption: STARC file open in Story Apps Story Architect 0.7

description: Story Architect offers tools for creating various types of written content, such as screenplays, comics, plays, and novels. You can start a new project from scratch or import an existing document, such as a .KITSP , .FDX , or .DOCX file, to edit within the app.
To create a STARC file, click the Main Menu (three-line hamburger icon) and select Create story . You can also import a document by clicking the Main Menu and selecting Import .
